page.title: 04Games Leiston children play.
page.content: Children like playing games.With their teacher they might play Rounders,Rugby touch,Football,Football rounders,Shinty or Non-stop Cricket.But in the playground they like Hop-scotch,sticky glue,it,skipping and ball games. If you don't know how to play sticky glue this is how you play it.You have five people and one of them is sticky glue.She puts out her hand and each person holds a finger.Then the person who is sticky glue says a riddle and when she says sticky glue every body runs to find a drain but if you are touched you stand still and wait for someone to free you. At home lots of children like to play board games like Monopoly or Cluedo and some lucky children have computers and they play eletronic games on them.
